def main():
    t=int(raw_input())
    for _ in range(t):
        candles=[int(i) for i in raw_input().split()]
        if min(candles[1:])==0:
            print(candles[1:].index(0)+1)
        else:
            op=""
            if min(candles)<min(candles[1:]):
                op+="1"
                for __ in range(0,candles[0]+1):
                    op+="0"
            else:
                for __ in range(0, min(candles[1:])+1):
                    op+=str(candles[1:].index(min(candles[1:]))+1)
            print(op)
            
            
        
if __name__=='__main__':
    main()
